  • mapping
  • alphaMapping

Interface alphaMapping

Hierarchy

  • alphaMapping

Callable

  • alphaMapping(alpha: Alpha): Alpha
  • brief

    A mapping for any Alpha. Basically, it transforms a user-defined alpha to a global one that can be used by superposition.

    Parameters

    • alpha: Alpha

      The user-defined alpha vector

    Returns Alpha

    The converted alpha vector
